deploy.startCommand: pwd && ls -la && ls -la portfolio/ && ls -la portfolio/media/ || echo 'No portfolio/media' && python3 manage.py migrate --noinput && python3 manage.py loaddata portfolio_data_clean.json || true && python3 manage.py create_default_superuser && python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput && gunicorn portfolio.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT
